sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import './forms.css' const Forms = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = React.useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', comment: '', isFriendly: true, employmentStatus: '' }) console.log(formData.employmentStatus) function handleChange(event) { const {name, value, type, checked} = event.target setFormData(prevFormData => { return { ...prevFormData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value } }) } return (
